title: Junior Teacher
additional-notes: A note in the January-June 1977 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first active issue renewal was recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, and was filed in March 1977.

There appear to be multiple publications with this title, all of which appear to be religious education periodicals, possibly for different denominations. The first issue renewal we found and the first contribution renewal we found may be for different publications.
